item.title: Notes on Mathematics - Optimization
item.description: Lagrange Kuhn-Tucker Dual Problem Lagrange PS11.Q1 Solve \(\max_{(x,y)\in \mathbb{R}^2} x+y\) s.t. \(x^2+y^2=2\) PS11.Q4 Solve \(\max_{x,y} xy\) s.t. \(5x+2y=20\) Kuhn-Tucker PS11.Q2 Solve \(\max_{(x,y)\in \mathbb{R}^2} -(x_1-4)^2 - (x_2-4)^2\) s.t. \(\begin{cases} x_1+x_2\leq 4 \\ 3x_1+x_2\leq 9\end{cases}\) PS11.Q3 Solve \(\max_{(x,y)\in \mathbb{R}^2} x_1^2 + x_2^2\) s.t. \(\begin{cases} x_1 \geq 0 \\ x_2\geq 0 \\ 3x_1+x_2\leq 9\end{cases}\) PS11.Q5 Solve \(\max_{x,y} xy\) s.t. \(\begin{cases} 5x+2y\leq 20 \\ x\geq 0\end{cases}\)
